/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
